item.title: The observed
item.description: Photo by Noah Buscher on Unsplash Here is a fun and equally disturbing fact: You have never seen your face and its guaranteed that you will never be able to see it. Yes, there is a case to be made about mirror images and photos but those are reflections. Reflections are the closest we can get to seeing how we look but they never fully capture what the eyes can see.
